5. Determine if any other crowd sizes are smaller than the crowd size at Lake Oval: By looking at the table, we can see that none of the other crowd sizes are smaller than 12176.

6. Final conclusion: The claim is TRUE because the smallest crowd size among all games is indeed the one for Lake Oval (12176).

claim: victoria park draw the second largest crowd of any of the game
